subject: Info
description_text:
Hello,

Recently I bought Simsonn Plus X pedals and I'm really happy with them.
I was just on Simsonn's website checking the VAM Pro set of two haptic
motors with power supply and mounting brackets, but when I went to check
out, it added 27,10$ of taxes to the price.

I have received my pedals from Germany, and there were no additional taxes
to the price. Is there a way to do it the same way for the haptic set?

Best regards!
Vlado Vrlika

conversations.body_text: Hi Vlado Vrlika,  Since our German warehouse currently does not have stock of the motors, we do have a stocking plan, but the exact timeline is not yet confirmed. It is estimated that it will take about two months for the goods to arrive.

Ok, thank you.
If they arrive at the German warehouse in 2 months, will I be able to order
from the Simsonn website without tax, or do I need to contact you via email?

On Fri, Sep 12, 2025 at 6:15 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Vlado Vrlika,    Certainly, we shall remove the duty once the stock arrives. You may keep an eye on it.
